Package nz.ac.wgtn.swen225.lc.Persistency

Class Saver

java.lang.Object
nz.ac.wgtn.swen225.lc.Persistency.Saver
public class Saver extends Object
This class is designed to Save the current map and player information to JSON format. It gets the information from the game state (domain obj) and saves it to the given file name.
Author:
Phillip

  • Method Details

    • Save

      public static void Save(Domain gameState, String saveFileSelected)
      This method can covert the given gameState into json format and dave it to the given file name (+.json). It will extract all the information needed from the gameState and will call additional methods to help convert to json before calling the save method.
      Parameters:
      gameState - , the current game state to be saved.
      saveFileSelected - , file to save the json to.

    • testParseArray

      public static String[][] testParseArray(Cell[][] cells)
      Method to access to cellsToStrings (a private method) for junit tests.
      Parameters:
      cells - , cells to be converted.
      Returns:
      list of parsed cells, converted to Strings.
